attributes.additional_details: We need a charge to physically show for ourselves and the grading system otherwise is inaccurate and sometimes unfair

rejection.details:
The Government has announced that the summer exam series will start on 7 June and end on 2 July for almost all AS and A levels and GCSEs, but there are no plans to cancel these exams: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/students-to-be-given-more-time-to-prepare-for-2021-exams

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Do not postpone A level and GCSE exams as a result of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553081
